faq.label: FAQs
faq.title: Quick answers
faq.description: If you don’t see your question here, just get in touch.

items.question: How often should hedges be trimmed?
items.answer: It depends on the hedge type and the look you want. We can recommend timing when we quote.

items.question: Can you reduce the height or width?
items.answer: Often yes. Send a photo and we’ll advise what’s practical and include it in the quote.

items.question: Do you remove hedge clippings?
items.answer: Yes—waste removal can be included. Let us know what you want taken away.

items.question: Do you do one-off trims?
items.answer: Yes—one-off trims and reset jobs are available.

items.question: Do you cover my area?
items.answer: Send your postcode and we’ll confirm availability.

finalCta.title: Want your hedges looking sharp again?
finalCta.description: Send a quick description (and photos if you can) and we’ll quote the trim clearly.
